mapper.select:
/* MvmnAplyDao.selectMvmnAplyDetailList */
SELECT A.APLYID , B.PRGRM_SCHDLID , B.DE , C.TME_NM , A.REG_DT AS RCPT_DT , A.INSTID , E.INST_NM , A.USERID APLY_USERID , F.NM APLY_USER_NM , A.TME_SCHDLID , A.ZIP , A.ADDR , A.ADDR_DTL , A.SIGNGU_CD , CONCAT((SELECT TA.CD_NM FROM TB_CMM_CD TA WHERE TA.CD = G.UPPR_CD), ' > ', G.CD_NM) AS SIGNGU_DESC , A.TELNO , F.MOBLPHON , A.EML , A.EDU_NOPE , A.MEMO , A.STTS_CD , D.CD_NM AS STTS_NM , A.MDFCN_DT , A.MDFRID , A.REG_DT , A.RGTRID FROM TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_APLY A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_TME_SCHDL B ON B.TME_SCHDLID = A.TME_SCHDLID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_TME C ON C.TMEID = B.TMEID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CD D ON D.CD = A.STTS_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_INST E ON E.INSTID = A.INSTID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_USER F ON F.USERID = A.USERID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CD G ON G.CD = A.SIGNGU_CD WHERE B.PRGRM_SCHDLID = #{prgrmSchdlid}
AND A.STTS_CD = #{searchSttsCd}
AND (E.INST_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR A.USERID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR F.NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR F.MOBLPHON LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%'))
AND E.INST_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND A.USERID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND F.NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND F.MOBLPHON LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(B.DE >= DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{searchDeStartDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'),'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(B.DE <DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{searchDeEndDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'),'%Y-%m-%d')
AND A.REG_DT >= DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{searchRcptStartDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'),'%Y-%m-%d')
AND A.REG_DT < DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{searchRcptEndDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'),'%Y-%m-%d')

/* MvmnAplyDao.selectMvmnAplyCloseList */
SELECT A.TMEID , A.TME_NM , B.DE , CASE WHEN USE_YN = 'Y' THEN CASE WHEN NOW() BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(B.DE,' ', A.BGNG_TM), '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(B.DE,' ', A.END_TM), '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') THEN '174102' ELSE '174103' END ELSE '174103' END RCPT_CD , A.REG_DT FROM TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_TME A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_TME_SCHDL B ON B.TMEID = A.TMEID WHERE 1=1 AND NOW() >= DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(B.DE,' ', A.BGNG_TM), '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')

/* MvmnAplyDao.selectMvmnAplyInfo */ SELECT A.APLYID , A.TME_SCHDLID , B.DE , C.TMEID , C.TME_NM , A.REG_DT AS RCPT_DT , A.INSTID , E.INST_NM , A.USERID APLY_USERID , F.NM APLY_USER_NM , A.TME_SCHDLID , A.ZIP , A.ADDR , A.ADDR_DTL , A.SIGNGU_CD , CONCAT((SELECT TA.CD_NM FROM TB_CMM_CD TA WHERE TA.CD = G.UPPR_CD), ' > ', G.CD_NM) AS SIGNGU_DESC , A.TELNO , A.FXNO , F.MOBLPHON , A.EML , A.EDU_NOPE , A.MEMO , A.RMRK , A.STTS_CD , D.CD_NM AS STTS_NM ,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(EDU_TRGT_CD SEPARATOR',') FROM TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_APLY_EDU_TRGT WHERE APLYID = #{aplyId} ) AS TRGT_CD , A.MDFCN_DT , A.MDFRID , A.REG_DT , A.RGTRID FROM TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_APLY A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_TME_SCHDL B ON B.TME_SCHDLID = A.TME_SCHDLID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_TME C ON C.TMEID = B.TMEID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CD D ON D.CD = A.STTS_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_INST E ON E.INSTID = A.INSTID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_USER F ON F.USERID = A.USERID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CD G ON G.CD = A.SIGNGU_CD WHERE A.APLYID = #{aplyId}

/* MvmnAplyDao.selectTmeSchdlList */ SELECT REPLACE(A.DE, '.', '-') DE , A.TMEID , B.TME_NM , A.TME_SCHDLID FROM TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_TME_SCHDL A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_TME B ON B.TMEID = A.TMEID WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRGRM_SCHDLID = #{prgrmSchdlid} ORDER BY A.DE

/* MvmnAplyDao.selectMemberList */
SELECT A.USERID APLY_USER_ID ,A.NM APLY_USER_NM ,A.EML ,A.INSTID ,B.INST_NM ,B.ADDR ,B.ADDR_DTL ,B.TELNO ,A.MOBLPHON ,A.MDFCN_DT ,A.REG_DT FROM TB_CMM_USER A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_INST B ON A.INSTID = B.INSTID WHERE 1=1 AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.STTS_CD <> '9'
AND ( A.INSTID IS NULL OR A.INSTID <> #{instid} )
AND A.NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND A.ACNT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND A.MOBLPHON LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND A.EML LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
